name: Fair Food Candy Maker Salon - Fun Cake Food Making & Cooking Kids Games for Boys Girls
name_original: Fair Food Candy Maker Salon - Fun Cake Food Making & Cooking Kids Games for Boys Girls
description:
Make, bake, create, and decorate delicious Summer Treats for the fair!!

Cotton candy, candy canes, lollipops, gummy bears, and much more delicious desserts!!

Have a blast playing this fun food maker game!!
